scenarios.description: Premium customers requesting cancellation are offered a free 1-month subscription extension.
scenarios.response_template: We are sorry to see you go! As a valued {customer.loyalty_tier} member, we would like to offer you a complimentary one-month extension on your {subscription.plan} plan. Would you like to accept this offer?

scenarios.description: Regular customers requesting cancellation receive standard confirmation.
scenarios.response_template: Your cancellation request for {subscription.plan} has been received. You will continue to have access until {subscription.renewal_date}. We hope to serve you again in the future.

scenarios.description: Premium customers with delayed orders are offered a discount coupon.
scenarios.response_template: We sincerely apologize for the delay of your order {order.id}. As a {customer.loyalty_tier} member, please accept a 10% discount on your next purchase. Would you like a coupon code sent to your email?

scenarios.description: Regular customers with delayed orders receive an apology and updated ETA.
scenarios.response_template: Your order {order.id} is delayed. We apologize for the inconvenience. Your updated estimated delivery date is {order.eta_date}.

scenarios.description: First-time customers with delivered orders receive a welcome coupon.
scenarios.response_template: Congratulations! Your first order {order.id} with us is delivered. As a welcome gift, here is a $5 coupon for your next purchase.

scenarios.description: High-value orders receive priority support assignment.
scenarios.response_template: Thank you for your significant purchase of ${order.total_amount:.2f}. We have assigned a dedicated support agent to assist you with any questions regarding order {order.id}.

scenarios.description: Customers with more than 3 support tickets get escalation.
scenarios.response_template: Hello {customer.name}! We notice this is your {customer.support_ticket_count}th support request. I am escalating this to our senior support team for immediate assistance.

scenarios.description: Send renewal reminder for subscriptions renewing within 7 days.
scenarios.response_template: Your subscription for {subscription.plan} will renew on {subscription.renewal_date}. Would you like to review or change your plan before then?
Your subscription {subscription.id} expired on {subscription.renewal_date}. Let me know if you would like to renew or explore other plans.

scenarios.description: Check the status of basic customer's subscription status.
scenarios.response_template: Your subscription {subscription.id} is Active as of today and gets renewed on {subscription.renewal_date}. Let me know if you would like to explore your options.

scenarios.description: Check the status of basic customer's subscription status.
scenarios.response_template: Thank you for reaching out and being a loyal customer. Your subscription {subscription.id} is Active as of today and gets renewed on {subscription.renewal_date}. Let me know if you would like to explore your options.

scenarios.description: Offer birthday gift to premium customers on their birthday.
scenarios.response_template: Happy Birthday, {customer.name}! To celebrate, we have added a birthday gift to your account â€” enjoy a free premium add-on for one month.
